definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="procedure_retval_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="procedure">Diaoyongshift0</field><field name="name0">shift</field><field name="name1">shift0</field><value name="arg0"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="7"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6右击珊瑚恢复失活的珊瑚类方块，小</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_new_line"></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6概率在脚下的水中生成热带鱼，如果</field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text_new_line"></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6目标是珊瑚块，有概率在珊瑚块顶部</field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text_new_line"></block></value><value name="ADD6"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6生成对应珊瑚。</field></block></value></block></value><value name="arg1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">详情</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
